forum.name: updates
forum.description: find out what's new with anylad. feature announcements and bug fix info. thanks all!
forum.latestCommentText: im gonna miss it for sure

comments.text: Hi all! As of version 137.1 (you're on [version]), there's a new area setting: "Unlisted"!
Unlisted means your area is still public, but won't be listed anymore in the areas default suggestions dialog (also not when lively), public search results, the friends list etc.
It can still be normally teleported to, and may show in e.g. the Visited Areas list normally. (Note unlisting won't be needed if the area's already Private.)
You can toggle the setting off again any time to have your area be re-listed normally as before.
